elesa ma rehera amuna samipayehi kolambaalaka wiharaya da (ema 21pari. 5,6 gatha) yanuwen ha dewanampiyathissa katha idiripath karana awasthawe di walas wawa karawana ema yuwa raja hata wishayen yedu ambaayak ambaa mathuyehi thaba yawwaya(ema 22 pari.4 gathawa) aadi washayen wiwidha thorathuru idiripath weyi. ef. aar. oolchinta anuwa dakunu aasiyanu kalapaye ujjeyini purayata dakunin pihiti wishalathama pauranika nagaraya wana anuradhapuraye wardhanaya pilibada wa adahas dakwana aacharya, rolanng silwa dakwanne anuradhapura nagaraya aarambhaye abhayawapi, gamaniwapi, thissawapi, nuwara wawa ha puliyankulama yana mulika gam waw 5kin samanwitha wu bawayi (2000:49).
